message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be perfect for your needs. I'm asking for $10,000. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $10,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $6,000. Would you be willing to consider that?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $6,000 is too low, I'm willing to come down a bit. How about $9,000?
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $9,000, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $7,500. Would you be willing to consider that?
